channel.title: Founders & Coders - Taster day
channel.description: We value diversity. We aim to have a balance of men and women on our courses and encourage applicants from backgrounds that are under-represented in the tech industry. There are no formal educational requirements; our selections are made on aptitude, work ethic and desire to have a positive impact on the world.

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description:
This blog uses Jekyll. For documentation see here.

Jekyll is best used for making static web sites and blogs. As you know we are hosted free on gh-pages, which is a free service provided by github.

Instructions

Create a post on this website, you can find the source code here, clone the repository on your local machine (in you case nitrous).

def print_hi(name)
  puts "Hi, #{name}"
end
print_hi('Tom')
#=> prints 'Hi, Tom' to STDOUT.

Check out the Jekyll docs for more info on how to get the most out of Jekyll. File all bugs/feature requests at Jekyll’s GitHub repo. If you have questions, you can ask them on Jekyll’s dedicated Help repository.
